description: Try our easy to follow Tipsy Berry Waffles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tipsy Berry Waffles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g mixed berries, such as blueberries, blackberries and raspberries

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a nonstick frying pan, add the berries, sugar and kirsch and cook over a high heat, stirring gently, for 1-2 minutes.

Meanwhile, toast or reheat the waffles according to the packet instructions. Put a waffle on each serving plate, spoon the berries over the waffles and top each portion with 1 tablespoon crème fraîche. Serve immediately.
